resources.string: Adaptive Search is a feature that helps users find what they are looking for by providing suggestions as they type. It uses machine learning to predict the user\'s intent and show relevant results.

Interactions is a feature that helps users engage with your app by providing suggestions based on their behavior. Deliver personalized, interactive promotions and messaging by leveraging real-time affinity detection, inferring visitor intent, and predicting their next action before they abandon.

Sections is a feature that helps you track user engagement by reporting section change events. It provides insights into how users interact with your app, which section they visit most frequently, and how long they spend on each section. Once a section was reported the Page Count will increase automatically, AI features that are calculated per page will be recalculated & predictions will be recalculated as well. if "Order Confirmation" is reported the "purchased" ai feature will be flagged automatically. The preferred way of reporting consists of Section, description & the current activity

Events is a feature that helps you track user actions by firing events (out of the box & custom). It allows you to monitor user interactions, such as button clicks, form submissions, and other important actions, to gain insights into user behavior and improve your app. Additionally Wandz uses this data to improve its predictions.

Affinities is a feature that helps you understand user preferences by providing insights into their interests, behaviors, and interactions with your app. It allows you to segment users based on their affinities and target them with personalized content, promotions, and recommendations. Once a user is detected as having an affinity, the user will continue to be associated with the affinity for 90 days. Additionally Wandz uses this data to improve its predictions.

As users navigate an e-commerce application, their preferences become clear through interactions with specific colors, such as blue or green, across multiple categories like shoes, jackets, or accessories. At the same time, their browsing patterns reveal an affinity for brands like Nike, Gucci, or Apple, helping tailor their shopping experience to their unique tastes.
